text: I don't know how that third party is sending data to HubSpot, so I'm sorry but can't help with that :confused: I'd suggest check on if there is any data available even, if not, you'll have to check witht he Sakari support

Hi, is there any way to unenroll contacts from workflow within an action?
My goal is to have a workflow that triggers a webhook on an email subscription event (opted in and opted out) even if they are resubscribed (multiple passes in the same workflow).
Thanks in advance
Can you show the exact workflow actions? I guess you can just do a if else branch where you have no other actions and use the "go to action" action?
